name.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: Name of the alert rule.

description.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: Description of the alert rule that will be included in the alert email.

isEnabled.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: Indicates whether the alert rule is enabled.

odata.type.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: Type of condition this alert rule uses.
Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: Type of data source this condition uses.

resourceUri.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The resource identifier of the resource the rule monitors.

metricName.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The name of the metric that defines what the rule monitors.

metricNamespace.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: Only should be present for availability level metrics, where the value must be WindowsAzure.Availability.

dataSource.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The resource from which the rule collects its data.

operator.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The operator used to compare the data and the threshold.

threshold.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The threshold value that activates the alert. Only for ThresholdRuleConditions.

failedLocationCount.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The number of locations that must fail to activate the alert. Only for LocationThresholdRuleConditions.

windowSize.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The period of time that is used to monitor alert activity based on the threshold. Must be between 5 minutes and 1 day. ISO 8601 duration format.

condition.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The condition that results in the alert rule being activated.

odata.type.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The type of action that is performed by the alert rule.

sendToServiceOwners.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: Whether the administrators (service and co-adiminstrators) of the service should be notified when the alert is activated.

customEmails.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: A list of administrator's custom email addresses notifiy of the activation of the alert.

action.description: Microsoft.Insights/alertrules: The action that is performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.

Id.description: Microsoft.Insights/webtests: Location id of the webtest

name.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The name of the profile.

minimum.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The minimum number of instances for the resource.

maximum.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The maximum number of instances for the resource. The actual maximum number may be limited by the cores that are available.

default.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The number of instances that will be set if metrics are not available for evaluation. The default is only used if the current instance count is lower than the default.

capacity.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The number of instances that can be used during this profile.

metricName.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The name of the metric that defines what the rule monitors.

metricResourceUri.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The resource identifier of the resource the rule monitors.

timeGrain.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The granularity of metrics the rule monitors. Must be one of the predefined values returned from metric definitions for the metric. Must be between 12 hours and 1 minute. ISO 8601 duration format.

statistics.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: How the metrics from multiple instances are combined.

timeWindow.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The range of time in which instance data is collected. This value must be greater than the delay in metric collection, which can vary from resource-to-resource. Must be between 12 hours and 5 minutes. ISO 8601 duration format.

timeAggregation.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: How the data that is collected should be combined over time. The default value is Average.

operator.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The operator that is used to compare the metric data and the threshold.

threshold.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The threshold of the metric that triggers the scale action.

metricTrigger.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The trigger that results in a scaling action.

direction.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: Whether the scaling action increases or decreases the number of instances.

type.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The type of action that should occur, this must be set to ChangeCount.

value.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The number of instances that are involved in the scaling action. This value must be 1 or greater. The default value is 1.

cooldown.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The amount of time to wait since the last scaling action before this action occurs. Must be between 1 week and 1 minute. ISO 8601 duration format.

rules.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: Contains a collection of rules that provide the triggers and parameters for the scaling action. A maximum of 10 rules can be specified.

timeZone.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The time zone of the start and end times for the profile.

start.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The start time for the profile.

end.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The end time for the profile.

fixedDate.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: A specific date for the profile. This element is not used if the Recurrence element is used.

frequency.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: How often the schedule profile should take effect. This value must be Week, meaning each week will have the same set of profiles.

timeZone.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The time zone for the hours of the profile.

days.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: A collection of days that the profile takes effect on.

hours.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: A collection of hours at which the profile takes effect at.

minutes.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: A collection of minutes at which the profile takes effect at.

schedule.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The scheduling constraints for when the profile begins.

recurrence.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The repeating times at which this profile begins. This element is not used if the FixedDate element is used.

profiles.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: Contains a collection of automatic scaling profiles that specify different scaling parameters for different time periods. A maximum of 20 profiles can be specified.

enabled.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: Specifies whether automatic scaling is enabled for the resource.

name.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The name of the autoscale setting.

targetResourceUri.description: Microsoft.Insights/autoscalesettings: The resource identifier of the resource that the autoscale setting should be added to.
